nodes.excerpt: We’re excited to announce Process Street 3.0, a major new milestone in our mission to help businesses make their recurring work fun, fast and faultless.
nodes.title: Process Street 3.0 - Simple process and workflow management for teams
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 我们很高兴地宣布Process Street 3.0，这是我们的一个重要的新里程碑，我们的使命是帮助企业使他们的经常性工作变得有趣、快速和无懈可击。
localize.tagline: 为团队提供简单的流程和工作流管理

localize.description: 我們很高興地宣佈Process Street 3.0，這是我們的一個重要的新里程碑，我們的使命是幫助企業使他們的經常性工作變得有趣、快速和無懈可擊。
localize.tagline: 爲團隊提供簡單的流程和工作流管理

nodes.excerpt: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.
nodes.title: SaaSync - Integrate QuickBooks Online and Xero with ChartMogul
nodes.author: Nick Franklin

localize.description: SaaSync从QBO或Xero检索发票和其他数据。这些数据经过转换后可用于ChartMogul。不能自动同步的数据会出现在审查屏幕上，SaaSync用户可以在将剩余数据推送到ChartMogul之前对其进行编辑。
localize.tagline: 用ChartMogul整合QuickBooks Online和Xero。

localize.description: SaaSync從QBO或Xero檢索發票和其他數據。這些數據經過轉換後可用於ChartMogul。不能自動同步的數據會出現在審查屏幕上，SaaSync用戶可以在將剩餘數據推送到ChartMogul之前對其進行編輯。
localize.tagline: 用ChartMogul整合QuickBooks Online和Xero。

nodes.excerpt: Abacum is a financial planning tool for mid-sized companies. Save time by integrating data sources and automating manual processes. Generate better insights with analytical tools built for finance-users. Collaborate easily across teams and locations.
nodes.title: Abacum - Helping finance teams deliver business insights 10x faster
nodes.author: Lindsay Wiese-Amos

localize.description: Abacum是一款针对中型企业的财务规划工具。通过整合数据源和自动化手动流程来节省时间。通过为财务用户设计的分析工具产生更好的洞察力。跨团队和地点轻松协作。
localize.tagline: 帮助财务团队以10倍的速度提供业务洞察力。

localize.description: Abacum是一款針對中型企業的財務規劃工具。通過整合數據源和自動化手動流程來節省時間。通過爲財務用戶設計的分析工具產生更好的洞察力。跨團隊和地點輕鬆協作。
localize.tagline: 幫助財務團隊以10倍的速度提供業務洞察力。

nodes.excerpt: http://www.crikle.com is a web-based sales solution that combines video calling with customised sales guidance and actionable information capture, to sell quickly. Less admin, more sales. Everything your team needs to convert more customers, faster.
nodes.title: Crikle - Sell more from anywhere
nodes.author: Guillermo Bresciano

localize.description: http://www.crikle.com 是基于网络的销售解决方案，将视频通话与定制化的销售指导和可操作的信息采集相结合，快速销售。减少管理，增加销售。您的团队所需的一切，以更快地转化更多的客户。
localize.tagline: 从任何地方销售更多

localize.description: http://www.crikle.com 是基於網絡的銷售解決方案，將視頻通話與定製化的銷售指導和可操作的信息採集相結合，快速銷售。減少管理，增加銷售。您的團隊所需的一切，以更快地轉化更多的客戶。
localize.tagline: 從任何地方銷售更多

nodes.excerpt: QuotaPath has integrated with HubSpot! With this CRM integration, sales reps can track quota attainment & earnings in real-time. Import HubSpot deals to automate the commission process. Close more deals, grow your revenue, and motivate your team.
nodes.title: QuotaPath + HubSpot integration - Calculate earnings & attainment from HubSpot deals

localize.description: QuotaPath已与HubSpot整合! 有了这个CRM集成，销售代表可以实时跟踪配额的实现和收益。导入HubSpot交易以自动化佣金流程。完成更多交易，增加您的收入，并激励您的团队。
localize.tagline: 计算HubSpot交易的收益和成就。

localize.description: QuotaPath已與HubSpot整合! 有了這個CRM集成，銷售代表可以實時跟蹤配額的實現和收益。導入HubSpot交易以自動化佣金流程。完成更多交易，增加您的收入，並激勵您的團隊。
localize.tagline: 計算HubSpot交易的收益和成就。

nodes.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.

nodes.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作场所管理软件，为企业提供员工在办公室或远程工作的选择。Worksphere可以自动预约办公桌，安全输入，并为您提供办公室使用数据，以正确确定工作场所的规模。

localize.tagline: 管理靈活工作場所的軟件

localize.description: 从创意到生产，与零部件供应商合作更快。为您的设计获取即时报价，在全球范围内寻找新的经过验证的供应商，直接从供应商处获得反馈，以避免错误，并以最少的延误生产最复杂的零件。

nodes.excerpt: Mailmodo is an email marketing tool, powered by AMP Emails, enabling users to create & send app-like interactive emails to improve conversions. As interactions happen inside the email, users can take action seamlessly within the email.
nodes.title: Mailmodo - Boost email conversions with interactive AMP emails.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Mailmodo是一款电子邮件营销工具，由AMP Email提供支持，使用户能够创建和发送类似应用的交互式电子邮件，以提高转化率。由于互动发生在邮件内部，用户可以在邮件中无缝地采取行动。
localize.tagline: 利用交互式AMP电子邮件提高电子邮件的转化率。

localize.description: Mailmodo是一款電子郵件營銷工具，由AMP Email提供支持，使用戶能夠創建和發送類似應用的交互式電子郵件，以提高轉化率。由於互動發生在郵件內部，用戶可以在郵件中無縫地採取行動。
localize.tagline: 利用交互式AMP電子郵件提高電子郵件的轉化率。

nodes.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.

nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: Drata通过持续监控其安全态势并自动收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制证据，每年可为公司节省数百小时的时间，以获得并保持SOC 2合规性。
localize.tagline: 将SOC 2合规性置于自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Drata通過持續監控其安全態勢並自動收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制證據，每年可爲公司節省數百小時的時間，以獲得並保持SOC 2合規性。
localize.tagline: 將SOC 2合規性置於自動駕駛狀態

nodes.excerpt: ShareDocView.com lets you share documents (PDF, Word, PowerPoint) with links to get detailed analytics on who opened which doc, when and for how long. Plus you can get email leads! ⠀ Get a FREE account and ask us in the live chat about the Product Hunt deal!
nodes.title: ShareDocView - Share docs with links to get analytics and email leads
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: ShareDocView.com让您可以分享带有链接的文档（PDF、Word、PowerPoint），以获得关于谁打开了哪个文档、何时打开以及多长时间的详细分析。此外，您还可以获得电子邮件线索 ⠀ 获得一个免费的账户，并在即时聊天中询问我们关于产品狩猎的交易!
localize.tagline: 分享带有链接的文档，以获得分析和电子邮件线索。

localize.tagline: 分享帶有鏈接的文檔，以獲得分析和電子郵件線索。

nodes.excerpt: Control solves compliance with one integration. SOC2, ISO 27001, PCI & more. No more complex legalese, writing policies or manually running endless checks across your systems. Accelerate & automate your security program and SOC2 compliance for FREE today.

localize.description: 控制解决了一次集成的合规性。SOC2、ISO 27001、PCI等。不再需要复杂的法律条文、编写政策或在您的系统中手动运行无休止的检查。加速和自动化您的安全程序和SOC2合规性，今天免费。

nodes.excerpt: 🤔 Do you think you have seen everything in dating apps? Hardly! ❤️ Zodier is a new way to look for mates and it‘s already in your phone! We unite bots and dating to simplify meeting and chatting. 😻 Dating + chatbots = Zodier. This is how the Zodier starts!

nodes.excerpt: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
nodes.title: Grapevine 2.0 - Schedule fewer zoom meetings with one-way video updates
nodes.author: Brandyn Morelli

localize.description: 被没完没了的变速会搞得筋疲力尽？Grapevine允许您每天早上从您的团队获取异步(单向)视频更新。简短的单向视频更新可帮助远程和本地团队保持联系，而无需安排或参加面对面会议。
localize.tagline: 通过单向视频更新安排更少的缩放会议

localize.description: 被沒完沒了的變速會搞得筋疲力盡？Grapevine允許您每天早上從您的團隊獲取異步(單向)視頻更新。簡短的單向視頻更新可幫助遠程和本地團隊保持聯繫，而無需安排或參加面對面會議。

nodes.excerpt: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
nodes.title: Base64.ai - Extract text, data, photos and more from all types of docs

localize.description: Base64.ai是一种云API，可以从所有类型的文档中提取数据、照片和签名。我们预建了ID、驾照、护照、签证、发票和更多文档类型的模型。集成只是一次API调用。
localize.tagline: 从所有类型的文档中提取文本、数据、照片等

localize.description: Base64.ai是一種雲API，可以從所有類型的文檔中提取數據、照片和簽名。我們預建了ID、駕照、護照、簽證、發票和更多文檔類型的模型。集成只是一次API調用。
localize.tagline: 從所有類型的文檔中提取文本、數據、照片等

localize.description: 毫不费力地收集用户的反馈录音，而无需他们安装任何东西。--https://hellozest.io/
localize.tagline: 从您的用户收集反馈录音

nodes.excerpt: Statusly is a Slack bot that helps you automate your Slack status and DND/away settings with Powerful Routines. Sync your Google Calendar and Zoom Meetings with your custom routines. For more information visit https://statusly.app/.
nodes.title: Statusly - Automate Slack status, DND based on your daily routines 🤖
nodes.author: Sanjith Kanagavel

localize.description: Statusly是一款松弛机器人，它通过功能强大的例程帮助您自动执行松弛状态和免打扰/离开设置。将您的Google日历和缩放会议与您的自定义例程同步。欲了解更多信息，请访问https://statusly.app/.。
localize.tagline: 根据您的日常工作🤖自动执行闲置状态和免打扰

localize.description: Statusly是一款鬆弛機器人，它通過功能強大的例程幫助您自動執行鬆弛狀態和免打擾/離開設置。將您的Google日曆和縮放會議與您的自定義例程同步。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問https://statusly.app/.。
localize.tagline: 根據您的日常工作🤖自動執行閒置狀態和免打擾

nodes.excerpt: Most scheduling tools put the burden on the recipient. SavvyCal makes it easy for both parties to find the best time to meet—in an instant.
nodes.title: SavvyCal - Sending your scheduling link shouldn't feel weird.
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 大多数日程安排工具都将负担放在收件人身上。SavvyCal让双方很容易找到最佳会面时间-在瞬间。
localize.tagline: 发送您的日程安排链接应该不会觉得奇怪。

localize.description: 大多數日程安排工具都將負擔放在收件人身上。SavvyCal讓雙方很容易找到最佳會面時間-在瞬間。
localize.tagline: 發送您的日程安排鏈接應該不會覺得奇怪。
